LanguageData.FTurtleShell.label: shell (fortress turtle)
LanguageData.FTurtleShell.description: A shell that was harvested from fortress turtle. Light, but as strong metal, this organic super material is used for building various arms and armor.
LanguageData.Rfeather.label: raptor feather
LanguageData.Rfeather.description: Colorful feathers that harvested from feather raptor. The feathers are very useful in the design of apparel for their ability to both insulate against cold and easily breathe against heat.
